content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, bringing my total to 11 units in the inventory. 

# Now that I have enough iron ore, I can return to the Stone Furnace to smelt it into iron plates again.
# I will insert the iron ore into the furnace and ensure it has enough fuel to continue smelting.

# First, I will check the inventory of the Stone Furnace to see how much coal is left.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
print(f"Current inventory of the Stone Furnace: {furnace_inventory}")

# Next, I will insert the iron ore into the furnace and check if it has enough coal to operate.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 iron ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=1)  # Ensuring there is at least 1 unit of coal for smelting.

# Finally, I will check the furnace's inventory again to confirm the items were inserted successfully.
print(f"Updated inventory of the Stone Furnace: {inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)}")
